title: Tulpan
description: Documentarian Sergey Dvortsevoy's first narrative feature is a gorgeous melange of tender comedy, ethnographic drama, and wildlife extravaganza.
"This joyous, one-of-a-kind movie is a must for anyone who doubts that the cinema has surprises still left in store." --Scott Foundas,
